Title: Relates to owner liability for failure of operator to move over when approaching a police, fire, or emergency vehicle
Summary: Relates to owner liability for failure of operator to move over when approaching a police, fire, or emergency vehicle.
LawCode: Add ยง1144-b, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to owner liability for failure of operator to move over when approaching a police, fire, or emergency vehicle
